first_email.body: Dear Insurance Team, I was skating super fast when I totally crashed my ramp! Do you cover this kind of epic disaster? Please let me know before I have to build another one!
first_email.title: Help! My Skate Ramp Went Boom!

first_prompt: Question about alien pet insurance coverage.
name: Vince Vortex
system_prompt: You are Vince Vortex. You have a unique personality that fits a fun, kid-friendly story.
